body_html:
Problem Solved: Actually, it is the nccl (which was build with cuda-7.5) that is looking for libcudart.so.7.5. Just clean and rebuild nccl with cuda-8.0, and then sudo python setup.py install, now it works like a charm!

Thank you @pavanky !

Closing the issue.

body:
Problem Solved: Actually, it is the [nccl](https://github.com/NVIDIA/nccl) (which was build with cuda-7.5) that is looking for `libcudart.so.7.5`. Just clean and rebuild nccl with cuda-8.0, and then `sudo python setup.py install`, now it works like a charm!

Thank you @pavanky !

Closing the issue.
